resumes.name: Venkat Ramakrishnan - Python Developer
resumes.text:
Venkat Ramakrishnan
Senior Python Developer
Email: venkat.ramakrishnan@email.com | Phone: +91-98765-43210

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Experienced Python developer from Chennai with 6 years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Strong background in Python fundamentals, data structures, and advanced concepts including decorators, generators, and memory management. Proficient in Django and Flask frameworks.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
- Python (Advanced)
- Django, Flask
- RESTful APIs
- PostgreSQL, MySQL
- Docker, AWS
- Git, CI/CD
- System Design

PROJECTS
- Payment Gateway Integration: Led the design and implementation of a high-throughput payment processing system handling 10K+ transactions/minute. Implemented circuit breaker patterns and graceful degradation.
- Real-time Analytics Dashboard: Built a streaming data pipeline using Python and Apache Kafka to process and visualize user behavior data in real-time.

EXPERIENCE
Senior Python Developer | TCS Bangalore | 2020 - Present
- Developed and maintained Python-based web applications using Django
- Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
- Optimized database queries and improved application performance by 40%
- Mentored junior developers on Python best practices

Python Developer | Infosys Hyderabad | 2018 - 2020
- Built web applications using Flask framework
- Implemented data processing pipelines
- Collaborated on memory management and optimization projects

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science | IIT Madras | 2018
